class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 3 students only. Thurs - synchronous required attendance with additional asynchronous expectations. Clinical dates TBA
course_description: The final clinical course, students will synthesize and apply nursing concepts and clinical reasoning through an intensive clinical experience with increasingly complex patient- and family-centered care within a collaborative teamwork model.
